author: Julian E. Barnes
title: U.S. Says Russia May Have Tampered With Chemical Attack Site
text:
The U.S. said it was concerned Russian officials may have tampered with the site of an alleged chemical attack in Syria before investigators could reach the area.
Western governments called on Russia and Syria to give unfettered access to Douma, the site of the alleged attack. The U.K. reported that investigators from the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons hadnâ€™t yet been allowed access to the site.
